content:
Hi everyone, I find that some of the theorem in mathlib is stated in TFAE, for example,

DiscreteValuationRing.TFAE

How should I use it if I want to use the 2nd term in the list implies the 4th term?

I believe that would be something along the lines of (DiscreteValuationRing.TFAE Aₘ hnf).out 1 3 (untested) (see the proof of docs#IsLocalization.AtPrime.discreteValuationRing_of_dedekind_domain in Mathlib.RingTheory.DedekindDomain.Dvr, for example)
Jiang Jiedong has marked this topic as resolved.
For future visitors: it took me entirely too long to figure out that I needed (t1Space_TFAE X).out 0 1 for that similar use case.
